sources.title: The Iron Man (1931)
sources.description: The Iron Man is an Aesop Fables cartoon directed by Harry Bailey, John Foster. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-iron-man-1931/

metadata.Plot: Prizefighter Mason loses his opening fight so wife Rose leaves him for Hollywood. Without her around Mason trains and starts winning. Rose comes back and wants Mason to dump his manager Regan and replace him with her secret lover Lewis.
metadata.Actors: Lew Ayres, Robert Armstrong, Jean Harlow
